name: Modin* Vs. Pandas Performance
description: This sample code illustrates how Modin* accelerates the performance of Pandas for computational operations on a dataframe.

steps: uv run ipython kernel install --user --name modin_vs_pandas
uv run jupyter nbconvert --ExecutePreprocessor.enabled=True --ExecutePreprocessor.kernel_name=modin_vs_pandas --to notebook Modin_Vs_Pandas.ipynb
